description: Verify shipping addresses in real-time around the world.

blocks.name: validateUSAddress
blocks.description: This API end point is for validating US addresses only.

args.name: requestId
args.info: Mandatory Client provided unique request id. Same request_id is returned as part of response header.

args.name: street
args.info: Mandatory Address line 1. It’s needed for any address validation

args.name: secondaryStreet
args.info: Optional Address line2, if it’s there. Examples are apt# or suite# etc.

args.name: city
args.info: Optional City & State OR zipcode should be present at least. If city & state are present then zipcode is ignored.

args.name: state
args.info: Optional 2 char valid USA state code. Example: NY / NJ / CA etc.

blocks.name: validateGlobalAddress
blocks.description: This API end point is for validating global addresses.

args.name: requestId
args.info: Mandatory Client provided unique request id. Same request_id is returned as part of response header.

args.name: street
args.info: Mandatory Address line 1. It’s needed for any address validation

args.name: country
args.info: Country name or ISO 3-char or ISO 2-char country code. Examples USA, CAN, AU etc.

args.name: secondaryStreet
args.info: Optional Address line2, if it’s there. Examples are apt# or suite# etc.

args.name: city
args.info: Optional City & State OR zipcode should be present at least. If city & state are present then zipcode is ignored.

args.name: state
args.info: Optional 2 char valid USA state code. Example: NY / NJ / CA etc.
